description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) has been known to reach a command and control server via one of nine proxy IP addresses. (Citation: Bitdefender Trickbot C2 infra Nov 2020) (Citation: Bitdefender Trickbot VNC module Whitepaper 2021)
